short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights played songs and artists in your queue on turntable.fm

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TT QueueLights highlights the room's recently played songs and artists in your queue, so you can make sure you're always playing something fresh!

Features:
- Highlight recently played songs and artists
- Adds a button to move a song to the bottom of your queue

The 30 most recent songs will be red. Other recently played songs will be orangish.

Songs recently played by the same artist will be highlighted in green.

Please be sure to leave me any feedback or issues you may have!

1.1.1.6
- Fixed queue highlighting on first load
- Queue song count and queue search now play nicely together

1.1.1.5
- Added queue song count
- Fixed move to bottom button

1.1.1.4
- Fixed for turntable.fm 5/30/2013 updates

1.1.1.3
- Fixed Move to Bottom button for new Multiple Playlist feature.
- Fixed incompatibility with new Turntable X buttons

1.1.1.0
- Fixed delay when moving a song to the bottom

1.1.0.0
- Nick's Feature: Move to bottom button - Moves the song to the bottom of your queue

1.0.1.0
- Reduced impact on scrolling your song queue
- Almost fixed issue when changing rooms
